text: Muhminkale! Unkalaiyum, unkal kutumpattaraiyum (naraka) neruppai vittuk kapparrik kollunkal; atan eriporul manitarkalum, kallumeyakum; atil katumaiyana palacalikalana malakkukal (kaval) irukkinranar, allah avarkalai evi etilum avarkal maru ceyya mattarkal, tankal evappattapatiye avarkal ceytu varuvarkal
